paper_abstract: In this paper, the minimum weight and the dimension of all cyclic codes of length p(n) over a field F-q, are computed, when p is an odd prime and F-q a finite field with q elements, assuming that (q) over bar generates the group of invertible elements of Z(pn). Furthermore, the minimum weight and dimension of codes which are sum of two minimal codes in F-q(C-p x C-p) are also computed. Finally, the efficiency of cyclic codes and noncyclic abelian codes of length p(2) are compared.
